config.name: Customer - Antares
config.description: IOOF Services Co Pty Ltd - Antares

config.name: Customer - APA
config.description: APA APT Management Services Pty Ltd

counters.name: Status_Active
counters.appliesTo: contains(system.staticgroups,"NTT-AU/South West Alliance of Rural Health/All") && ntt.monitoring.status=="Active"

counters.name: Status_InActive
counters.appliesTo: contains(system.staticgroups,"NTT-AU/South West Alliance of Rural Health/All") && ntt.monitoring.status=~"InActive"

config.name: Customer - South West Alliance of Rural Health

counters.name: Health Normal (ping)
counters.appliesTo: contains(system.staticgroups,"NTT-AU/South West Alliance of Rural Health/All") && system.hoststatus =="normal"

counters.name: SNMP Operational
counters.appliesTo: contains(system.staticgroups,"NTT-AU/South West Alliance of Rural Health/All") && auto.snmp.operational=="true"

config.name: South West Alliance of Rural Health_monitoring_states
